an4.186:1.1: Atha kho annataro bhikkhu yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantam etadavoca:
an4.186:1.2: “kena nu kho, bhante, loko niyati, kena loko parikassati, kassa ca uppannassa vasam gacchati”ti?
an4.186:2.2: Bhaddako kho te, bhikkhu, ummaggo, bhaddakam patibhanam, kalyani paripuccha.
an4.186:2.4: ‘kena nu kho, bhante, loko niyati, kena loko parikassati, kassa ca uppannassa vasam gacchati’”ti?
an4.186:2.6: “Cittena kho, bhikkhu, loko niyati, cittena parikassati, cittassa uppannassa vasam gacchati”ti.
an4.186:3.1: “Sadhu, bhante”ti kho so bhikkhu bhagavato bhasitam abhinanditva anumoditva bhagavantam uttari panham apucchi:
an4.186:3.3: Kittavata nu kho, bhante, bahussuto dhammadharo hoti”ti?
an4.186:4.2: Bhaddako kho te, bhikkhu ummaggo, bhaddakam patibhanam, kalyani paripuccha.
an4.186:4.5: Kittavata nu kho, bhante, bahussuto dhammadharo hoti’”ti?
an4.186:4.8: suttam, geyyam, veyyakaranam, gatha, udanam, itivuttakam, jatakam, abbhutadhammam, vedallam.
an4.186:4.9: Catuppadaya cepi, bhikkhu, gathaya atthamannaya dhammamannaya dhammanudhammappatipanno hoti bahussuto dhammadharoti alamvacanaya”ti.
an4.186:5.1: “Sadhu, bhante”ti kho so bhikkhu bhagavato bhasitam abhinanditva anumoditva bhagavantam uttari panham apucchi:
an4.186:5.3: Kittavata nu kho, bhante, sutava nibbedhikapanno hoti”ti?
an4.186:6.2: Bhaddako kho te, bhikkhu, ummaggo, bhaddakam patibhanam, kalyani paripuccha.
an4.186:6.5: Kittavata nu kho, bhante, sutava nibbedhikapanno hoti’”ti?
an4.186:6.7: “Idha, bhikkhu, bhikkhuno ‘idam dukkhan’ti sutam hoti, pannaya cassa attham ativijjha passati;
an4.186:6.8: ‘ayam dukkhasamudayo’ti sutam hoti, pannaya cassa attham ativijjha passati;
an4.186:6.9: ‘ayam dukkhanirodho’ti sutam hoti, pannaya cassa attham ativijjha passati;
an4.186:6.10: ‘ayam dukkhanirodhagamini patipada’ti sutam hoti, pannaya cassa attham ativijjha passati.
an4.186:6.11: Evam kho, bhikkhu, sutava nibbedhikapanno hoti”ti.
an4.186:7.1: “Sadhu, bhante”ti kho so bhikkhu bhagavato bhasitam abhinanditva anumoditva bhagavantam uttari panham apucchi:
an4.186:7.3: Kittavata nu kho, bhante, pandito mahapanno hoti”ti?
an4.186:8.2: Bhaddako kho te, bhikkhu, ummaggo, bhaddakam patibhanam, kalyani paripuccha.
an4.186:8.5: Kittavata nu kho, bhante, pandito mahapanno hoti’”ti?
an4.186:8.7: “Idha, bhikkhu, pandito mahapanno nevattabyabadhaya ceteti na parabyabadhaya ceteti na ubhayabyabadhaya ceteti attahitaparahitaubhayahitasabbalokahitameva cintayamano cinteti.
an4.186:8.8: Evam kho, bhikkhu, pandito mahapanno hoti”ti.
